pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Projection Designs // Generate maximum projection (MaxPro) designs for quantitative and/or qualitative factors. Details of the MaxPro criterion can be found in: (1) Joseph, Gul, and Ba. (2015) "Maximum Projection Designs for Computer Experiments", Biometrika, 102, 371-380, and (2) Joseph, Gul, and Ba. (2018) "Designing Computer Experiments with Multiple Types of Factors: The MaxPro Approach", Journal of Quality Technology, to appear.
